SEARCH
Package com.oblong.jelly

Interface SlawWriter

public interface SlawWriter
Slaw serializer, writing binary and YAML data streams.

The SlawIO factory creates instances of this interface, which provides methods for serializing Slaw objects.

Writers offer not concurrency guarantees, and attaching more than one to the same output stream (or the same file) will produce undefined results. For proper resource management, they should be explictly closed once you're done with them.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    close()
    Closes the underlying data stream.
    SlawIO.Format
    format()
    Writers can output binary or YAML data.
    boolean
    write(Slaw s)
    Appends a new serialized Slaw to the end of the underlying data stream.

  • Method Details

    • write

      boolean write(Slaw s)
      Appends a new serialized Slaw to the end of the underlying data stream. Returns a success indicator.

    • close

      boolean close()
      Closes the underlying data stream. For proper resource management, you should make sure that this method is called on the reader once you're done with it.

    • format

      SlawIO.Format format()
      Writers can output binary or YAML data. This method tells you what format this writer is using.
